# LLM Guidance for Solution Understanding

To understand the purpose, architecture, and specifications of this solution, refer to the following locations:

- docs/     (developer and user documentation, including architecture, configuration, devops, and diagrams)
- spec/     (machine-readable specifications)
- infra/    (infrastructure as code, Bicep modules, and configuration)
- sample-data/ (example datasets for testing and demonstration)
- scripts/  (automation scripts for deployment and data management)
- README.md (solution overview and getting started)
- azure.yaml (solution configuration)
